description: Cognitive Car Dashboard workspace which allows multi-turn conversations to perform tasks in the car.

values: I prefer not to text while I drive.

output.text: Sorry I can't make a phone call. I must be all out of minutes!

values: Sorry I haven't learned answers to questions like this.
That question is out of scope for this application, take a look at the Watson Assistant Enhanced application to handle questions like these.

dialog_nodes.parent: Entry Point For Up Down Commands

values: I understand you want me to turn up something. You can say increase the volume or turn up the AC.

dialog_nodes.parent: Entry Point For Up Down Commands

output.text: I can only perform one operation at a time. We can start with the first one. What would you like me to do?

dialog_nodes.parent: Entry Point For Up Down Commands

values: I'm not sure about that. You can say things like "Turn on my lights" or "Play some music."
I am having trouble understanding you. Try asking your question in a different way.

output.text: Sorry I don't recognize that genre. Want to try something? Jazz? Rock?
Unfortunately I don't have any @genre_bad music in my collection. Try genres like classical or rock.

dialog_nodes.parent: Entry Point For On Off Commands

output.text: I can only perform one operation at a time. We can start with the first one. What would you like me to do?

dialog_nodes.parent: Entry Point For On Off Commands
Entry Point For On Off Commands

output.text: I understand you want me to turn on something. You can say turn on the wipers or switch on the lights.

dialog_nodes.parent: Entry Point For On Off Commands
Entry Point For On Off Commands

values: Sure thing! Which genre would you prefer? Rock is my personal favorite.
I can only perform one operation at a time. What would you like me to do?

output.text: Sorry I haven't yet learnt to perform operations with phones.

dialog_nodes.title: Entry Point For On Off Commands
dialog_nodes.dialog_node: Entry Point For On Off Commands

output.text: I don't know much about traffic. I only know that it gets a little heavier downtown, but your route isn't affected.

Entry Point For On Off Commands

values: I'm sorry I haven't been able to help you.
Unfortunately I don't know much about the weather. I'm still learning.

output.text: Hello! I'm doing good. I'm here to help you. Just say the word.

values: Hi. It looks like a nice drive today. What would you like me to do?
